title: Pony and Horse Rides at Gallop Stable Bukit Timah
blurb: Enjoy pony rides for kids and horse rides for adults.
description: Gallop Stable @ Horsecity (Bukit Timah) offers pony rides for children aged 3 and above, providing a safe and thrilling horseback riding experience. Horse rides for adults are also available. Rides are fully supervised by trained staff, and helmets are provided. Pony and horse rides are available from Tuesdays to Sundays. Weekday sessions are from 10 am to 12 pm and 2 pm to 6 pm. Weekend sessions are from 9 am to 12 pm and 2 pm to 7 pm. Please note that rides are not available during wet weather or extreme heat.
datetime_display: Tuesdays to Sundays: Weekdays 10 am-12 pm/2 pm-6 pm, Weekends 9 am-12 pm/2 pm-7 pm
Keyword_tag: Pony rides, horse rides, kids activities, outdoor activities, family fun

title: Gallop Stable @ Horsecity (Bukit Timah)

title: Gallop Stable @ Pasir Ris Park
blurb: Enjoy pony and horse rides in a natural setting.
description: Gallop Stable @ Pasir Ris Park offers pony and horse rides for all ages in a scenic park environment. Children aged 3 years and above can enjoy pony rides, while adults can participate in horse rides. Rides are supervised by trained staff, and helmets are provided for safety. Pony and horse rides are available from Tuesdays to Sundays. Weekday pony rides are available in two sessions: 10 am to 12 pm and 2 pm to 7 pm. Weekend pony rides are available in two sessions: 8 am to 12 pm and 2 pm to 7 pm. Please note that pony and horse rides are not available during wet weather or in extreme heat.

title: Gallop Stable Horsey Activities
blurb: Pony and horse rides for all ages and abilities.
description: Gallop Stable offers a variety of horsey activities including pony and horse rides suitable for all ages and abilities. They also provide pony and bunny feeding experiences, birthday party packages, photoshoot opportunities, and corporate and group events. Enjoy a day out with the family and experience the joy of interacting with these gentle animals. Gallop Stable provides a safe and fun environment for children and adults to learn about and appreciate horses and ponies. Activities are designed to be engaging and educational, making it a memorable experience for everyone. Whether you're a seasoned rider or a first-timer, there's something for everyone at Gallop Stable.
Keyword_tag: Pony rides, horse rides, bunny feeding, birthday parties, photoshoot, corporate events, family activities

title: Gallop Stable: Corporate and Group Events
blurb: Events for corporate groups at Gallop Stable.
description: Gallop Stable offers unique and engaging corporate and group events centered around horses and equestrian activities. These events provide opportunities for team building, recreation, and learning about horses in a fun and interactive environment. Activities may include guided horse rides, pony rides, stable tours, and demonstrations. Tailored packages are available to suit different group sizes and preferences, ensuring a memorable experience for all participants. These events are designed to promote teamwork, communication, and appreciation for animals and nature. Gallop Stable provides a safe and enjoyable setting for corporate and group outings.
Keyword_tag: Horse riding, pony rides, stable tours, corporate events, group activities, team building, equestrian activities, animal interaction, outdoor recreation
